original_text: Immediately, Jesus asked them to come with him. They left their father and his workers in the boat, and they went with Jesus to be his disciples.
korean_text: 곧 부르시니 그 아버지 세베대를 품꾼들과 함께 배에 버려 두고 예수를 따라가니라

sentences.original_text: Immediately, Jesus asked them to come with him.
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님은 즉시 그들에게 자기와 함께 오라고 요청하셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: and his workers in the boat,
